modules.description: This module supports operations to create and manipulate color and style values for enhancing terminal output, including foreground/background color selection, gradient generation, and text attributes like bold, italic, and underline. It provides a fluent interface to iteratively configure layout properties (margins, padding, width) and finalize styled text rendering through a `build` step. Common applications include crafting visually distinct command-line interfaces, formatted logs, or interactive terminal UIs with dynamic color transitions and precise spacing control.
